doc.title: 365 Choices a Year
doc.plot: A window into the complex journey of addictions and treatment. The film highlights a behaviour approach to addictions where lifestyle and social context are at the heart of the problem; this is different than your typical AA meeting. The treatment process and living free of addictions is complicated; it means making right choices every day, 365 choices a year.
